name: Wii Model Animation File
summary: Animation file used by Nintendo Wii games such as Mario Kart Wii; typically found within a resource package file ( .BRRES ) and contains data referenced by the game to determine the animation of a model's movement; includes animation data such as model scale, rotation, and frame count; similar to .PAT0 and .MDL0 files used by Wii games.
